snippet.title: Can you help find Andrew Webster?
snippet.content:
Andrew Webster.
Police are seeking public help to find a 15-year-old Heddon Greta youth who has been missing since mid-July. Andrew Webster disappeared from a Main Street home on July 19, leaving authorities with serious concerns for his welfare due to his age. The youth is described as being of caucasian appearance, about 180cm tall, of a slim build, with curly brown hair and a black spacer earring in his left ear. Anyone who knows of his whereabouts or has any information is urged to contact Maitland Police Station via Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.
